text_to_speech_model.description: The model to use for text to speech.
text_to_speech_model.title: Text To Speech Model

text_to_speech_voice.description: The voice to use for text to speech.
text_to_speech_voice.title: Text To Speech Voice

speech_to_text_model.description: The model to use for speech to text.
speech_to_text_model.title: Speech To Text Model

speech_to_text_temperature.description: The sampling temperature, between 0 and 1. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic. If set to 0, the model will use log probability to automatically increase the temperature until certain thresholds are hit.
speech_to_text_temperature.title: Speech To Text Temperature
